PROCEDURE.TITLE: How to Bathe a Cat
PROCEDURE.OVERVIEW: This procedure tells you how to bathe a cat. Cats don't like to take baths. You could get hurt doing this. Be sure to obtain all the required protective gear before you start.

INSTRUCTIONS.STEP: Locate the cat, who by now is hiding under the bed.
Place the cat in the tub of water.
Using the First Aid kit, repair the damage to your head and arms.
Place the cat back in the tub and hold it down.
Wash it really fast, then make an effort to dry it with the towels.
Decide not to do this again.
